Package jkarel

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • jkarel.World

  • public class World
extends java.lang.Object
    World houses most of the static constants used in object creation and rendering, Karel file locations and images, and the speed at which the WorldPanel updates. The World.step() method is responsible for the animation of the Panel.

    • Method Detail

      • openWorld

        public static void openWorld​(java.lang.String mapName)
        To close the current world if there is one, then creates a new WorldFrame with the specified map file.
        Parameters:
        mapName - the path to the map file to be loaded

      • openDefaultWorld

        public static void openDefaultWorld​()
        Closes the current world if there is one, then creates a new WorldFrame with the default map.

      • closeWorld

        static void closeWorld​()
        If a world frame has been previously created, its close method is called, closing the associated WorldFrame and WorldBackend before disposing of the current WorldFrame.

      • saveWorld

        public static void saveWorld​(java.lang.String filename)
        To save current world to file.
        Parameters:
        filename - - name of file to be used

      • readWorld

        public static void readWorld​(java.lang.String filename)
        To read world from file.
        Parameters:
        filename - - name of file to be used

      • reset

        public static void reset​()
        To open a default world.

      • setTrace

        public static void setTrace​(boolean onOff)
        To set tracing mode for debugging.
        Parameters:
        onOff - switch to trace mode if true; otherwise, if false.

      • setSpeed

        public static void setSpeed​(int s)
        To set the speed at which the display updates.
        Parameters:
        s - the requested speed of the Display. If it is greater than the max speed, the speed is set to the max speed

      • getSpeed

        public static int getSpeed​()
        To get the speed at which the display updates.
        Returns:
        speed

      • getBeeperFont

        To get the font with which to render beepers.
        Returns:
        font to be used with beeper number

        Returns:

      • setBinary

        public static void setBinary​(boolean option)
        To set beeper text option.
        Parameters:
        option - = true for binary values; false for beeper size

      • isBinary

        public static boolean isBinary​()
        To get beeper text option.
        Returns:
        true, if binary option is set; false, otherwise

        Returns:

        y - (street)

        Parameters:
        reason - to finish actions.

      • hang

        private static void hang​()
        To block the Thread until input is given to System.in.

      • isStopped

        public static boolean isStopped​()
        To return whether or not the World is currently stopped (no longer able to update).
        Returns:
        true, if it is not working, false, otherwise

        y - (street)
